description.value:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Order Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Order Domain Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCommand000]{Command}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHeroism000]{Heroism}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHoldPerson]{Hold Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplZoneOfTrut]{Zone of Truth}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMassHealin]{Mass Healing Word}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSlow000000]{Slow}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCompulsion]{Compulsion}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLocateCrea]{Locate Creature}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCommune000]{Commune}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}
